txt_en: Patriotism is deeply rooted in the instincts and emotions of human being.
txt_cn: 爱国精神深深根植于人的本能和情感之中。

txt_en: It's time to start living the life you've imagined!
txt_cn: 是时候开始过自己想要的生活了！

txt_en: East or west, home is the best.
txt_cn: 金窝银窝不如自家的草窝。

txt_en: Don't look at your phone for more than two hours, because it will power off.
txt_cn: 千万不要连续看手机超过两个小时，因为那样手机会没电。

txt_en: At the place we don't know, there is always some sadness we haven't seen.
txt_cn: 在我们不曾了解的地方，总有些未曾看到的心酸。

txt_en: Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.
txt_cn: 不管你焦虑与否，该发生的总会发生。

txt_en: The end of the holiday feels like the end of the world.
It is not more vacation we need—it is more vocation!
txt_cn: 我们需要的不是更多的假期，而是更强的使命感！

txt_en: Things do not change. We do.
Everything in the past is a mirror of wisdom.
txt_cn: 过往一切都是智慧的映射。
